turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about The Last Victims.
turn.2: The Last Victims The Last Victims is a 2019 political drama film directed by Maynard Kraak.
turn.4: The film was filmed entirely on location in KwaZulu-Natal South Africa and premiered at the Pan African Film Festival (PAFF) on 8 February 2019.
turn.6: The film then opened the Rapid Lion - South African International Film Festival at the historic Market Theater in Johannesburg, South Africa on 1 March 2019.
turn.8: It screened "in competition" with three nominations: Best Feature Film, Best Cinematography (Meekaaeel Adam) and Best Actor in a Leading Role (Sean Cameron Michael).
turn.10: The film was then selected at 40th Durban International Film Festival (DIFF), Durban South Africa.
turn.12: The film is now selected in competition at Knysna Film Festival, Knysna, South Africa & African Movie Academy Awards (AMAA) in Nigeria.
